reviewQuestionAnswesViews.QuestionText: Is the salary as per market standard?
Tell us about your last increment
How many hours you normally work in a day?
Does Bharti Airtel Ltd have a flexible working hours policy?
How often do you have parties/offsites?

answersView.AnswerTextHi: प्रबंधन इस पर विश्वास नहीं करता है

reviewQuestionAnswesViews.QuestionText: How often do employees get promotions?
How many trainings do you attend every year?

answersView.AnswerText: More than 6 times in a year
answersView.AnswerTextHi: एक वर्ष में 6 बार से अधिक

detailedDescription.articleBody: Bharti Airtel Limited, also known as Airtel, is an Indian multinational telecommunications services company based in New Delhi, Delhi NCT. It operates in 18 countries across South Asia and Africa, and also in the Channel Islands.
detailedDescription.articleBodyHi: भारती एयरटेल लिमिटेड, जिसे एयरटेल के नाम से भी जाना जाता है, नई दिल्ली, दिल्ली एनसीटी में स्थित एक भारतीय बहुराष्ट्रीय दूरसंचार सेवा कंपनी है, यह दक्षिण एशिया और अफ्रीका के 18 देशों में काम करती है, और चैनल द्वीप समूह में भी,
